content: this is a free pattern for a big soap saver that is perfect for leftover cotton yarn the pattern is worked from the bottom in the round photos are provided for tricky steps you can also purchase a pdf for $3 here if you prefer an ad-free experience or working offline https //payhip com/b/eih5f the pattern is written for a single large size and instructions are provided for increasing or decreasing the width and length soap pictured with green bag is dr squatch soap and measures about 3 inches by 3 inches additional optional materials * size g hook for initial chain or chain loosely * yarn needle
